artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Med blue & blue/green warp.  3 green weft.  Plain weave variation. Inside mat folder with 99..1213.21, 22, 23. Tag with "#1" attached to piece. Folder contains written Larsen descriptive information. "H-8B" written on outside of folder. (blue & 2 greens)
title: Lapis Development Sample
